snippet.title: Progression and Dungeons - An Elaborate History of Chess - DevLog 3
snippet.description:
Wishlist now on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1255020/An_Elaborate_History_of_Chess/

In this dev log for An Elaborate History of Chess we add turn-based dungeons to the game so we can focus more on the turn-based strategy elements that being a chess game brings, as well as adding an objective system to guide players through the game.

Join our Discord: https://discord.gg/f2hdFN6
Check out our last game Paper Pirates: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1234220/Paper_Pirates/

Let us know if you have any ideas! :)
#gamedev #indiedev #devlog #gamedevelopment #chess 

Music: Song of Storms and Hyrule Castle by Mikel https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=oCaOSz13h_o&ab_channel=GameChops
